h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
content: Then head to the cell on the right to find another Blade Monk guarding a **Treasure Chest** full of random materials. There's also a green Wisp just outside on the ledge.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm', specifically from the subsection 'Upper Pagoda (Level 4)'.
The content is as follows:
Then head to the cell on the right to find another Blade Monk guarding a **Treasure Chest** full of random materials. There's also a green Wisp just outside on the ledge.
